texts.name: Alkin
texts.biography: King Tralossk never really liked Alkin, but gave him his own command in the hopes that he would one day get himself killed.  That never happened, and Alkin has led a long and glorious career, much to the displeasure of the King.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Gorgons or Mighty Gorgons for each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.name: Gorgons
